abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column on Texas Rangers general manager Jon Daniels, whose team is headed for World Series for second consecutive season; says that most of the Rangers' roster is filled with impact players who arrived in trades before they reached their potential, thanks to Daniels.
snippet: Team executives built the Rangers, who are going to the World Series again, by valuing their scouts’ input when making staffing decisions.
lead_paragraph: Team executives built the Rangers, who are going to the World Series again, by valuing their scouts’ input when making staffing decisions.

headline.main: For Rangers, a Strong Team Behind the Team
headline.print_headline: For Rangers, a Strong Team Behind the Team
headline.seo: For Texas Rangers, a Strong Team Behind the Team
